name: tm91
effect: Teaches Flash Cannon to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flash Cannon to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it in one shot. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it in one shot. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it in one shot. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.
